notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Influenza virus research in Luis Mart√≠nez-Sobrido laboratory is partially funded by the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), National Institutes of Health (NIH), Department of Health and Human Services, under the Centers of Excellence for Influenza Research and Surveillance (CEIRS) contract no. HHSN272201400005C (New York Influenza Center of Excellence, NYICE), the Department of Defense (DoD) PR17046; and with funds from a University of Rochester Research Award to Aitor Nogales.
